total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the rows that contain the number 1 in the input grid.
Q2: For each row identified in Q1, shift the 1s to the leftmost side of the row.
Q3: Identify the rows that contain the number 2 in the input grid.
Q4: For each row identified in Q3, shift the 2s to the leftmost side of the row.
Q5: Identify the rows that contain the number 4 in the input grid.
Q6: For each row identified in Q5, shift the 4s to the leftmost side of the row.

Q4: Shift the 2s to the left side of the row, replacing the 8s.
Q5: Identify the rows that contain the number 4 in the input grid.
Q6: Shift the 4s to the left side of the row, replacing the 8s.
